direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the class loader, with one setting and the other retrieving it.
Both methods involve decisions related to class loading, specifically whether to use the context class loader.
Setting the use of context class loader can directly influence the behavior of getClassLoader.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the class loader is a prerequisite for testing getClassLoader.
Configuring the use of context class loader is necessary to fully test getClassLoader.
Checking the use of context class loader is part of the decision-making process in getClassLoader.
The default class loader retrieval can be compared to the result of getClassLoader for assertions.
